statements: SELECT * FROM ab_testing_messages ORDER BY test_id DESC;
SELECT message, design FROM ab_testing_messages WHERE audience_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_messages WHERE conversion_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5;
SELECT message FROM ab_testing_messages WHERE design = 'A/B';
SELECT test_id, audience_size, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_messages WHERE test_id = 3;
SELECT test_id, message, design, audience_size, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_messages WHERE audience_size > 1000 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_messages WHERE design = 'Variant B' OR design = 'Variant C' ORDER BY test_id ASC;
SELECT test_id, message, design, audience_size FROM ab_testing_messages WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05 AND audience_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY audience_size DESC;
SELECT test_id, message, design, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_messages WHERE design = 'Variant A' AND conversion_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY test_id DESC;
SELECT test_id, message, audience_size, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_messages WHERE audience_size > 500 ORDER BY audience_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_messages;
SELECT message_text, design_id FROM marketing_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT message_text, design_id FROM marketing_messages ORDER BY design_id DESC;
SELECT test_id, conversion_rate FROM test_results WHERE test_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT message_text, design_id, timestamp FROM marketing_messages WHERE design_id = '3ecf9867-4f50-45f2-b2d5-677efb7afa14';
SELECT * FROM marketing_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM marketing_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(message_id) FROM marketing_messages;
SELECT design_id, COUNT(*) FROM test_results GROUP BY design_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT message_text, variant, conversion_rate FROM marketing_messages JOIN test_results ON marketing_messages.message_id = test_results.message_id WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM brand_messages;
SELECT design, message FROM brand_messages WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM testing_groups ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM testing_groups WHERE group_id = 3;
SELECT group_id, AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM test_results GROUP BY group_id;
SELECT * FROM brand_messages
SELECT message, design, variant FROM brand_messages ORDER BY variant ASC
SELECT message, design, variant FROM brand_messages WHERE variant > 1
SELECT message, design, variant FROM brand_messages WHERE design LIKE '%header%'
SELECT brand_messages.message, test_results.conversion_rate FROM brand_messages JOIN test_results ON brand_messages.id = test_results.message_id
SELECT * FROM marketing_message WHERE message_type = 'Special' ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT message_text, message_type FROM marketing_message WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, design_name FROM marketing_message JOIN design_options ON marketing_message.group_id = design_options.group_id ORDER BY design_name;
SELECT * FROM experiment_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM experimental_groups WHERE group_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM marketing_message ORDER BY message_id DESC, message_type ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT design_name, group_name FROM design_options INNER JOIN experimental_groups ON design_options.group_id = experimental_groups.group_id WHERE design_type = 'Banner' AND group_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT message_text FROM marketing_message WHERE message_type = 'Promo' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT group_name FROM design_options INNER JOIN experimental_groups ON design_options.group_id = experimental_groups.group_id ORDER BY group_name;
SELECT design_name, design_type, conversion_rate FROM design_options INNER JOIN experiment_results ON design_options.design_id = experiment_results.design_id WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM MarketingMessages;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM MarketingMessages WHERE message_type='announcement';
SELECT message_type, message_text, message_design FROM MarketingMessages ORDER BY message_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM ATestGroup JOIN MarketingMessages ON ATestGroup.message_id = MarketingMessages.message_id;
SELECT group_id, test_date FROM BTestGroup WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM MarketingMessages WHERE message_type = 'special';
SELECT * FROM ATestGroup JOIN BTestGroup ON ATestGroup.message_id = BTestGroup.message_id;
SELECT result_id, conversion_rate FROM TestResults ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM TestFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT message_text, message_design FROM MarketingMessages WHERE message_type = 'informative' AND message_design LIKE '%modern%';
